title: The Problem: A Massive Credit Chasm
bullets: 60M+ MSMEs are the backbone of India's economy.
They face a systemic credit gap due to slow, paper-heavy processes.
High rejection rates from traditional banks lacking alternative data models.
This lack of capital directly stifles business growth and potential.
AI-driven risk assessment using GST, banking, and transaction data.
Instant loan matchmaking with a network of NBFCs and banks.
A fully digital, paperless onboarding process completed in minutes.
Transparent terms and competitive rates for borrowers.
Onboard NBFC and small finance bank partners for loan capital.
Targeted digital marketing campaigns for MSME acquisition.
Integrations with accounting platforms and B2B marketplaces.
Channel partnerships with Chartered Accountant networks.
Total Addressable Market (TAM): 60M+ Indian MSMEs.
Serviceable Addressable Market (SAM): 15M GST-registered MSMEs.
Initial Target Market: 1M MSMEs in manufacturing and retail sectors in Tier-1 & 2 cities.
AI-Powered Micro-Loan Marketplace
Addressing the ₹20 Trillion MSME Credit Gap
Founders with Fintech & AI Expertise
Ask: ₹5 Cr for 15% Equity
Primary: 1.5% - 2.5% loan origination fee from lenders.
Secondary: 0.5% processing fee from borrowers.
Future: Data analytics and risk-as-a-service for financial institutions.
Year 1 (2026) Revenue: 0.5
Year 2 (2027) Revenue: 2.0
Year 3 (2028) Revenue: 10.0
Projected to achieve profitability in Year 2.
speaker_notes: The current lending infrastructure is not equipped to serve the dynamic needs of the MSME sector, creating a significant and costly bottleneck.
